content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input_string::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_string)
    current_len = 0
    result = ""
    
    for word in words
        if current_len + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            current_len = 0
        end
        result *= " $word"
        current_len += length(word) + 1
    end
    
    return result
end

# Example
input_string = "Hello, this is a sample string to demonstrate the wrap_string function"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(input_string, text_width=15)
println(wrapped_text)
```
